descriptionHtml:
[center][size=14]Description:[/size][/center]
Notice: The changes by this mod do not appear to be taking effect correctly. The mod has been taken down until the problem can be found and resolved. It will be back working and with even deadlier dragons soon. :-)


[u]Versions[/u]
N/A

[u]To-Do:[/u]
Increase dragon damage without altering player spells.
Add mod variant for 3x stronger dragons.

[u]Changelog:[/u]
[b]0.4 - First release.[/b] Dragon names were corrupted for some reason.

[b]1.0 - Beta release.[/b] Dragon names corrected!

[b]1.2 - Beta Release[/b]  Adds recommended version to double dragon toughness. 

[center][size=14]Installation:[/size][/center]
Extract the chosen .esp file to your \\Skyrim\\data directory, and enable the file in your game launcher.

If you correctly installed the mod and your Data Files option is greyed out in the launcher, you will need to do the following.
1. Go to Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim
2. Open up the SkyrimPrefs.ini file
3. Look about half way down for [Launcher]
4. Add \"bEnableFileSelection=1\" to the bottom of that section without quotes and save the file.
The Data Files option should now appear on the launcher.

[u]Known bugs:[/u]The mod isn\'t working in some circumstances. That\'s a pretty big bug!

[center][size=14]Uninstallation:[/size][/center]
Delete the ESP and dragons will go back to vanilla. 


[center][size=14]Notes:[/size][/center]
Check out my smithing improvements mod [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1020]Lost Art of the Blacksmith[/URL].
Enjoy!

:-)
author: Impulseve
